item.title: Rewrite of a Flask Web App in Clojure
item.author: whatacold@gmail.com (Ken Huang)
item.description: Intro A few years ago, I made a simple web app in Flask to deal with some text processing problems from my daily work. It has two main features: Feature #1: generating compile_commands.json for GNU Makefile projects written in C/C++ using the output of the make command. Because, unlike CMake, the make command can't generate it. Feature #2: extract text using Python regex. It's handy when I feel like sed/awk/grep's line-oriented processing isn't enough for the task at hand.
